mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN_BOARD WHERE A_BOARD_ANSWER = 'N' AND A_BOARD_DELETE_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY A_BOARD_IN_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN_BOARD WHERE A_BOARD_ANSWER = 'Y' AND A_BOARD_DELETE_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY A_BOARD_IN_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN_BOARD WHERE A_BOARD_DELETE_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY A_BOARD_IN_DATE DESC
SELECT AB.*, M.M_NAME FROM ADMIN_BOARD AB JOIN MEMBER M ON AB.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE AB.A_BOARD_ANSWER = 'N' AND AB.A_BOARD_DELETE_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY AB.A_BOARD_IN_DATE DESC
SELECT AB.*, M.M_NAME FROM ADMIN_BOARD AB JOIN MEMBER M ON AB.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE AB.A_BOARD_ANSWER = 'Y' AND AB.A_BOARD_DELETE_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY AB.A_BOARD_IN_DATE DESC
SELECT ab.*, M.M_NAME FROM ADMIN_BOARD ab JOIN MEMBER m ON ab.M_NO = m.M_NO WHERE ab.A_BOARD_DELETE_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY ab.A_BOARD_IN_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMIN_BOARD SET A_BOARD_ANSWER = 'Y', A_BOARD_ANSWER_CONTENT = #{content}, A_BOARD_ANSWER_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE A_BOARD_NO = #{no}
UPDATE ADMIN_BOARD SET A_BOARD_DELETE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE A_BOARD_NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT mem.m_name, mem.m_path AS imageFilePath, mem.m_picture AS imageFileName, TO_CHAR(ad.a_board_in_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS inDate, ad.* FROM ADMIN_BOARD ad JOIN member mem ON ad.m_no = mem.m_no WHERE ad.a_board_delete_date IS NULL ORDER BY ad.a_board_in_date DESC
